<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_922204_ptaskmgr_personal_task_category</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_922204_ptaskmgr_personal_task_category">parentISNOTEMPTY^parentVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="parent" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="parent" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>On Personal Task Category Parent Changed</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var parentGr = current.parent.getRefRecord();
	if (current.getValue('user') != parentGr.getRefRecord()) {
		notification = new UINotification('task_category_notification');
		notification.setAttribute('parent', 'Cannot set parent to category from another user.');
		notification.send();
		current.setAbortAction(true);
		return;
	}
	var sys_id = current.getValue('sys_id');
	if (sys_id == parentGr.getValue('sys_id')) {
		notification = new UINotification('task_category_notification');
		notification.setAttribute('parent', 'Cannot add current category as its own parent.');
		notification.send();
		current.setAbortAction(true);
		return;
	}
	while (!gs.nil(parentGr.parent)) {
		if (sys_id == (parentGr = parentGr.parent.getRefRecord()).getValue('sys_id')) {
			notification = new UINotification('task_category_notification');
			notification.setAttribute('parent', 'Circular parent category references not allowed.');
			notification.send();
			current.setAbortAction(true);
			return;
		}
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-24 17:41:31</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>da2804f0473a11103f08bce5536d437e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>On Personal Task Category Parent Changed</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Personal Task Manager" source="x_922204_ptaskmgr">f220fba847b611103f08bce5536d4306</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Personal Task Manager">f220fba847b611103f08bce5536d4306</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_da2804f0473a11103f08bce5536d437e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-10-24 17:41:31</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=da2804f0473a11103f08bce5536d437e"/></record_update>
